name: cheddar-dog
description: fetch transactions from your financial institutions.  supports bofa (ca) and amex

scripts.mjs: tsc -d && npm run renamejs && npm run renamemap
scripts.renamejs: for old in dist/src/*.js; do mv $old dist/src/`basename $old .js`.mjs; done
scripts.renamemap: for old in dist/src/*.js.map; do mv $old dist/src/`basename $old .js.map`.mjs.map; done

author: Sam Khavari <skhavari@cs.stanford.edu>
